textWithDelay.text: Why?
Can't you see anything?
Try to broaden your view.
Literally, look wider.
Up.
How is it? Can you do it?
This is going to be really hard.
After all your struggles, I wish I could just skip it and show you the ending.
But you know, such games don't exist in this world.
So as a developer, this is my final mission for you.
Just once.
Just win once.
You know how it works by now.

Even if you lose 100 times, winning just once
clears the game, haha.
And the way to clear this time will be a bit different.
Until now, you had to eliminate all visible enemies to clear it,
but this time, defeating the final boss will end the game instantly.
If you win even just once...
I'll be ready to roll the ending credits, haha.
Let's go!
What did I say? Fail 100 times, succeed just once, right?
Great job.

So now you've defeated the final boss,
aren't there any endings?
What do you mean, endings?

You weren't seriously expecting an ending
just because you won once, were you?

Oh fine! Instead of an ending, I can show you
something cool.
Ta-da~
This is where you've been wandering around so far. How is it?
Seeing it like this, it's not as big as you thought, huh?
Alright then!

Now that you've figured out how to win,
let's run again together, haha.
This is just the beginning.
